name: Dead Blood
description:
It's late, she is alone in the apartment. She was asked to wait here. She is listening for a knock on the door.

Listening for the sound of breathing.

She is not really alone in the apartment.

Use the Left and Right arrow keys to make her move.

Use the Down arrow key to make her interact with things.

If you enjoy this experience be sure to rate it, recommend it to your acquaintances or; leave a comment on what you appreciated along with any suggestions you may have for improvements.  Without this support it is very difficult for games to gain any kind of public attention.
